definition: a breed of stocky medium-sized short-haired dog with a brindled coat and square-jawed muzzle developed in Germany
details:
noun
- a breed of stocky medium-sized short-haired dog with a brindled coat and square-jawed muzzle developed in Germany
- someone who fights with his fists for sport
= synonyms: pugilist
- a workman employed to pack things into containers
= synonyms: bagger, packer
